group_1.narration: I'm at the Yukuni City All-Stars Festival right now,@and I've sensed the presence of Witches nearby.
Two in number, reactions to Witches that have@been around for quite some time,@so we assume they are grown and strong.
There are three of us here, but since we want to@minimize the damage as much as possible,@would anyone be able to give us a hand?
One of us is busy at the Festival,@so I don't think she'll be able to join us,@but I think the two of us can help you@along the way.

group_1.textRight: We can't afford to wait for those two,@we don't have the time...

group_1.textLeft: But if we can't finish off the Witches, we'll need@their support.

group_1.textRight: With a two-stage approach between us and those@girls, we'll definitely bring these Witches down.
They were supposed to be together as a pair,@but it seems only one Witch has moved.

group_1.textLeft: Essentially, we can't seize them at the same time@unless we split up.
One of us should take care of this one here,@while the other two go after the other Witch.
It hasn't gotten very far, so we should be able@to catch up with it in no time.
Kurusu, you excel at support, so you should@team up with someone else.
Miura, you and I should split up.

group_1.textRight: Then I will fight this Witch on my own.
You two, take care of the rest.
Alright. Is that okay with you, Himuro-san?
